content:
LdapSessionOptions Class

Definition

The LdapSessionOptions class is used to get or set various LDAP session options.

In this Article

public class LdapSessionOptions
Inheritance
System.Object
LdapSessionOptions

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Properties

AutoReconnect

The AutoReconnect property specifies if auto-reconnect is enabled.

public bool AutoReconnect { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

This property is true if auto-reconnect is enabled or false if it is not.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

DomainName

The DomainName property returns the domain to which this connection is bound.

public string DomainName { get; set; }
Value
String

The domain to which this connection is bound.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

HostName

The HostName property returns the name of the LDAP server associated with the connection.

public string HostName { get; set; }
Value
String

The name of the LDAP server associated with the connection.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

HostReachable

The HostReachable property specifies whether the host is reachable.

public bool HostReachable { get; }
Value
Boolean

This property is true if the host is reachable or false if it is not.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

LocatorFlag

The LocatorFlag property specifies one of the values of the LocatorFlags enumeration that are used when locating a domain controller.

public System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LocatorFlags LocatorFlag { get; set; }
Value
LocatorFlags

One of the values of the LocatorFlags enumeration that are used when locating a domain controller.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

PingKeepAliveTimeout

The PingKeepAliveTimeout property contains a TimeSpan object that specifies the minimum number of seconds the client waits, after the last response from the server, before sending a keep-alive ping.

public TimeSpan PingKeepAliveTimeout { get; set; }
Value
TimeSpan

A TimeSpan object that specifies the minimum number of seconds the client waits, after the last response from the server, before sending a keep-alive ping.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

ArgumentException

The specified time span is less than Zero.

PingLimit

The PingLimit property contains the number of unanswered pings that the client sends before closing a connection.

public int PingLimit { get; set; }
Value
Int32

The number of unanswered pings that the client sends before closing a connection.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

ArgumentException

The specified value is less than zero.

PingWaitTimeout

The PingWaitTimeout property contains a TimeSpan object that specifies the number of milliseconds that the client waits for the response to come back after sending a ping.

public TimeSpan PingWaitTimeout { get; set; }
Value
TimeSpan

A TimeSpan object that specifies the number of milliseconds that the client waits for the response to come back after sending a ping.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

ArgumentException

The specified time span is less than Zero.

ProtocolVersion

The ProtocolVersion property specifies the LDAP protocol version to use.

public int ProtocolVersion { get; set; }
Value
Int32

The LDAP protocol version to use.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

QueryClientCertificate

The QueryClientCertificate property contains a QueryClientCertificateCallback object that specifies the default callback function used to specify client certificates when establishing an SSL connection.

public System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QueryClientCertificateCallback QueryClientCertificate { get; set; }
Value
QueryClientCertificateCallback

A QueryClientCertificateCallback object that specifies the default callback function used to specify client certificates when establishing an SSL connection.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

Remarks

If the ClientCertificates property on the LdapConnection object is also set, the certificate specified in the ClientCertificates property is ignored.

ReferralCallback

The ReferralCallback property contains a ReferralCallback object that specifies the default callback function used when chasing referrals.

public System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ReferralCallback ReferralCallback { get; set; }
Value
ReferralCallback

A ReferralCallback object that specifies the default callback function used when chasing referrals.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

ReferralChasing

The ReferralChasing property contains a ReferralChasingOption object that specifies how the LDAP library follows referrals returned by LDAP servers.

public System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ReferralChasingOptions ReferralChasing { get; set; }
Value
ReferralChasingOptions

A ReferralChasingOption object that specifies how the LDAP library follows referrals returned by LDAP servers.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

InvalidEnumArgumentException

The specified value is not defined in ReferralChasingOption.

ReferralHopLimit

The ReferralHopLimit property specifies the number of hops allowed when chasing referrals.

public int ReferralHopLimit { get; set; }
Value
Int32

The number of hops allowed when chasing referrals.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

ArgumentException

The specified value is less than zero.

RootDseCache

The RootDseCache property enables the internal RootDSE cache.

public bool RootDseCache { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

This property is true if the cache is enabled or false if it is not.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

SaslMethod

The SaslMethod property specifies the preferred Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) binding method.

public string SaslMethod { get; set; }
Value
String

The preferred SASL binding method.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

Sealing

The Sealing property enables Kerberos encryption.

public bool Sealing { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

This property is true if Kerberos encryption is enabled or false if it is not.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

SecureSocketLayer

The SecureSocketLayer property enables secure socket layer on connection.

public bool SecureSocketLayer { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

This property is true if secure socket layer is enabled or false if it is not.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

SecurityContext

The SecurityContext property specifies the security context associated with the current connection.

public object SecurityContext { get; }
Value
System.Object

The security context associated with the current connection.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

SendTimeout

The SendTimeout property contains a TimeSpan object that specifies the send time-out.

public TimeSpan SendTimeout { get; set; }
Value
TimeSpan

A TimeSpan object that specifies the send time-out.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

ArgumentException

The value specified is less than Zero.

Signing

The Signing property enables Kerberos encryption.

public bool Signing { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

This property is true if Kerberos encryption is enabled or false if it is not.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

SslInformation

The SslInformation property contains a SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation object that contains data about the current secure connection.

public System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation SslInformation { get; }
Value
SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation

A SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation object that contains data about the current secure connection.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

SspiFlag

The SspiFlag property specifies the flags to pass to the Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI) InitializeSecurityContext function. For more information about the InitializeSecurityContext function, see the InitializeSecurityContext function topic in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

public int SspiFlag { get; set; }
Value
Int32

The flags to pass to the SSPI InitializeSecurityContext function.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

TcpKeepAlive

The TcpKeepAlive property enables TCP keep-alive.

public bool TcpKeepAlive { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

This property is true if TCP keep-alive is enabled or false if it is not.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

VerifyServerCertificate

The VerifyServerCertificate property contains a VerifyServerCertificateCallback object that specifies the default callback method to use to verify server certificates when an SSL connection is established.

public System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyServerCertificateCallback VerifyServerCertificate { get; set; }
Value
VerifyServerCertificateCallback

A VerifyServerCertificateCallback object that specifies the default callback method to use to verify server certificates when an SSL connection is established.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

Methods

FastConcurrentBind()

The FastConcurrentBind method enables support for fast concurrent binds.

public void FastConcurrentBind ();
Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

PlatformNotSupportedException

This method does not work on the current platform.

LdapException

An LDAP error occurred.

StartTransportLayerSecurity(DirectoryControlCollection)

The StartTransportLayerSecurity method starts transport layer security encryption.

public void StartTransportLayerSecurity (System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection controls);
controls
DirectoryControlCollection

A DirectoryControlCollection object that contains the controls to use.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

TlsOperationException

The request failed.

LdapException

An LDAP error occurred.

StopTransportLayerSecurity()

The StopTransportLayerSecurity method ends transport layer security encryption.

public void StopTransportLayerSecurity ();
Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The LdapConnection object is already disposed.

TlsOperationException

The request failed.
